name: Sword and Pistol

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Dex 13, Point-Blank Shot, Rapid Shot, Snap Shot, Two-Weapon Fighting, base attack bonus +6.

sections.body: When you use the Two-Weapon Fighting feat while wielding a melee weapon and a crossbow or firearm, your attacks with the crossbow or firearm provoke no attacks of opportunity from foes that you threaten with your melee weapon.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: Making a ranged attack provokes attacks of opportunity.
sections.name: Normal

description: You effortlessly pair melee and ranged weaponry.
